UPDATE.CLOSE_THE_APP_TO_UPDATE: Close completely the app or the browser to install the update

AUTH.REGISTER_A_NEW_ACCOUNT_TO_THE_SYSTEM: Register a new account to the system
AUTH.HAVEN_T_RECEIVED_CONFIRMATION_CODE: Haven't received the confirmation code yet?
AUTH.CONFIRM_A_REGISTRATION_HINT: We've sent you a verification code at the email address you provided us: please insert the code here to confirm your registration
AUTH.RESEND_CONFIRMATION_CODE_HINT: Insert your username and we will send you another code at the email address you provided us; please check also your SPAM folder
AUTH.PASSWORD_POLICY_VIOLATION: The password must be at least {{ n }} characters long
AUTH.REGISTRATION_COMPLETED: Registration completed: you can proceed to sign in
AUTH.CONFIRMATION_CODE_INVALID: The confirmation code is invalid for this user
AUTH.PASSWORD_RESET_HINT: Type in your username or your email to request a password reset
AUTH.CHANGE_THE_PASSWORD_HINT: Note: the password should consist of {{ n }} characters or more
AUTH.HAVEN_T_RECEIVED_A_RESET_CODE: Haven't received the reset code yet?
AUTH.PASSWORD_RESET_CODE_SENT: The code to reset the password has been sent via email
AUTH.PASSWORD_CHANGED: Password changed! Now you can sign in again
AUTH.CONFIRM_PASSWORD_ERROR: User not found, code not correct or password too easy
AUTH.YOU_NEED_TO_CHOOSE_A_NEW_PASSWORD: Choose a new password for your account
AUTH.PRIVACY_POLICY_CHECK: By logging in, you declare to accept the following
